name: Lucky Piano
description:
The Piano app is a virtual piano or mobile piano simulator that will make you a virtuoso! It’s easy to play such a piano – even beginner musicians who have never seen the keyboard before can do it. The application has a huge database of various tunes, each of which you can play yourself just by following the instructions!
Choose a song and difficulty level and start the game! You will see signs on the top of the screen, follow them and you will hear a beautiful tune created by your own fingers. Try not to make mistakes so that the tune stays clear and smooth, without sharp sounds!
The catalog of the app has the best compositions for the piano. Choose what you like, practice, and learn new melodies, increase your rating in the game, and get rewards! The more and the better you play, the more tunes you learn, the more music you create using the app, the cooler you become. There is no limit to perfection, and you can become a virtuoso. Share your achievements with friends and play the Piano with them: find out which one of you is better?
The piano simulator is being constantly updated, the catalog of songs is growing, as well as your capabilities!
